pk.accordian.name: pk.accordian
pk.accordian.description:
Create a new accordian component from an unordered list element `
    ` with the below structure: HTML:

    • Content header

      Content to collapse

    • Content header

      Content to collapse

    • Content header

      Content to collapse
    Javascript: pk.accordian({ element: document.getElementById('accordian'), animate: true, multiple: true });

props.name: element
props.description: DOM element to convert to component

props.name: animate
props.description: Animate expand/collapse actions

props.name: multiple
props.description: Allow multiple sections to be expanded simultaneously

return.description: Object  Consisting of original DOM element (item `0`)

pk.carousel.name: pk.carousel
pk.carousel.description:
Create a new carousel component from an unordered list element `
    ` HTML:
    • Slide 1
    • Slide 2
    • Slide 3
    Javascript: pk.carousel({ element: document.getElementById('carousel'), delay:5000 });

props.name: element
props.description: DOM element to convert to component

props.name: value
props.description: Starting item index

props.name: tabindex
props.description: Tabindex of component, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `0`

props.name: delay
props.description: Delay in `ms` between item changes

return.description: Object  Consisting of original DOM element (item `0`) and class methods (see below)

pk.chart.name: pk.chart

params.name: type
params.description: Chart type to create, `pie` (use to create donut charts), `line`, `scatter` (use to create bubble charts), `area`, `column` or `bar`

params.name: center
params.description: If chart type `pie`, the inner radius to create a donut chart, expressed as a percentage of diameter (`2*r`)

params.name: data
params.description: Object array of data to use for the chart

params.name: axis
params.description: Object keys in data to use for `x` and `y` axes

props.name: x
props.description: Object keys in data to use for `x` axis

props.name: y
props.description: Object keys in data to use for `y` axis, marked optional as not required for `pie` charts

props.name: r
props.description: String denoting object key in data to use for point radius, can be set to number

params.name: series
params.description: Object keys in data used for series designation - only an Array for `pie` charts, string for all other types

params.name: margin
params.description: Object of `top`, `right`, `left` and `bottom` margin amounts in pixels. Defaults to `20,20,50,20`

params.name: gridlines
params.description: Show gridlines for chart types other than `pie`

params.name: colors
params.description: Object key value pairs where the key is a series name, the value is the value to use

params.name: legend
params.description: Custom function responsible for building chart legend, defaults to default constructor if not passed

params.name: tooltip
params.description: Custom function responsible for building chart legend, defaults to default constructor if not passed

pk.checkbox.name: pk.checkbox

props.name: element
props.description: DOM element to convert to control

props.name: value
props.description: Value of initially selected option, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `0`

props.name: name
props.description: Name of underlying input control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `pk-checkbox-RandInt`

props.name: label
props.description: String to use for the control label, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or its `innerHTML`

props.name: tabindex
props.description: Tabindex of control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `0`

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disabled state of control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `false`

props.name: listeners
props.description: Object array of event listeners to bind to underlying input(s)

return.description: Object  Consisting of original DOM element (item `0`) and class methods (see below)

pk.colorpicker.name: pk.colorpicker

props.name: element
props.description: DOM element to convert to control

props.name: value
props.description: HEX string of initially selected color, defaults black `#000000`

props.name: listeners
props.description: Object array of event listeners to bind (nb. only detects `change` event)

return.description: Object  Consisting of original DOM element (item `0`) and class methods (see below)

pk.datepicker.name: pk.datepicker

props.name: element
props.description: DOM element to convert to control

props.name: value
props.description: Value of initially selected option, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `0`

props.name: name
props.description: Name of underlying input control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `pk-select-RandInt`

props.name: tabindex
props.description: Tabindex of control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `0`

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disabled state of control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `false`

return.description: Object  Consisting of original DOM element (item `0`) and class methods (see below)

pk.drag.name: pk.drag

props.name: element
props.description: DOM element to attach drag handlers to

props.name: handle
props.description: DOM element (child of `element`) to use as drag handle

props.name: move
props.description: Show movement during drag, either `true`, `false` or an object consisting of `x` and `y` {Boolean} values

props.name: container
props.description: Object containing details about container

props.name: element=document.body
props.description: DOM element used as container, defaults to `document.body`

props.name: style=restrict
props.description: Type of containment, either `restrict`, `snap` or {Object} consisting of `x` and `y` values calculated relative to `container.element`

props.name: listeners
props.description: Object array of event listeners to bind to underlying element(s) - consisting of `dragstart`, `dragend` and `dragging`

return.description: Object  Consisting of original DOM element (item `0`)

pk.modal.name: pk.modal

props.name: element
props.description: DOM element to convert to component

props.name: header
props.description: Modal header content (`HTML` allowed)

props.name: content
props.description: Modal body content (`HTML` allowed)

props.name: draggable
props.description: Whether to allow modal dragging

return.description: Object  Consisting of original DOM element (item `0`) and class methods (see below)

props.name: element
props.description: DOM element to convert to control

props.name: count
props.description: Number of items

props.name: value
props.description: Value of initially selected option, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `0`

props.name: name
props.description: Name of underlying input control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `pk-toggle-RandInt`

props.name: tabindex
props.description: Tabindex of control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `0`

props.name: disabled

pk.scroll.name: pk.scroll

props.name: element
props.description: DOM element to attach drag handlers to

props.name: sensitivity
props.description: Number in px to scroll incrementally on `mousewheel` and `key` events. Can also be expressed as percentage, e.g. `10%` of content

props.name: axis
props.description: Object consisting of `x` and `y` {Boolean} values denoting scrollable axis, DOM element to attach drag handlers to. Defaults to element attribute `pk-scroll` or `y`

return.description: Object  Consisting of original DOM element (item `0`)

pk.select.name: pk.select

props.name: element
props.description: DOM element to convert to control

props.name: options
props.description: Object array of control options

props.name: value
props.description: Option value

props.name: name
props.description: Option name (displayed label)

props.name: selected
props.description: Option selected state

props.name: value
props.description: Value of initially selected option, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `0`

props.name: name
props.description: Name of underlying input control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `pk-select-RandInt`

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder when no options selected, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `Please select...`

props.name: multiple
props.description: Whether to allow multiple options to be selected, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `false`

props.name: dropdown
props.description: Display options in dropdown list

props.name: tabindex
props.description: Tabindex of control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `0`

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disabled state of control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `false`

return.description: Object  Consisting of original DOM element (item `0`) and class methods (see below)

pk.slider.name: pk.slider
pk.slider.description:
Create a new slider control

HTML:

	<input id='slider' />
	
Javascript:

	pk.slider({
		element: document.getElementById('slider'),
		units: 'mm',
		min: 30,
		max: 980, 
		value: 133
	});

props.name: element
props.description: DOM element to convert to control

props.name: value
props.description: Initial value, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `0`

props.name: axis
props.description: Either `x` (horizontal) or `y` (vertical), ignored if slider is circle

props.name: min
props.description: Minimum value

props.name: max
props.description: Maximum value

props.name: decimals
props.description: Number of decimal places

props.name: name
props.description: Name of underlying input control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `pk-slider-RandInt`

props.name: tabindex
props.description: Tabindex of control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `0`

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disabled state of control, defaults to the attribute value set on the passed element, or `false`

props.name: listeners
props.description: Object array of event listeners to bind to underlying input(s)

props.name: circle
props.description: Object array of properties to define circular slider

props.name: stroke
props.description: Stroke width of slider circle

props.name: stroke.inner
props.description: Stroke width of inner slider circle

props.name: stroke.outer
props.description: Stroke width of outer slider circle

return.description: Object  Consisting of original DOM element (item `0`) and class methods (see below)

return.description: Object  Consisting of original DOM element (item `0`) and class methods (see below)

props.name: name

props.name: tabindex

pk.tooltip.name: pk.tooltip
pk.tooltip.description:
Class used for creating tooltips
The value passed to the `position` attribute is added to the tooltip as a CSS class of the format `pk-*position*`. Custom positions containing the keywords `top`, `left`, `bottom` and/or `right` can be applied to assume the relevant attributes, i.e. `bottomright`
HTML Show Tooltip Javascript: pk.tooltip({ element:document.getElementById('tooltip'), content:'Tooltip content', position:'left' });

props.name: element
props.description: DOM element to apply tooltip to

props.name: content
props.description: Tooltip content (`HTML` allowed)

props.name: position
props.description: Tooltip position (`top`, `right`, `bottom` or `left`)

props.name: delay
props.description: Time in `ms` before tooltip is shown

pk.color.name: pk.color
pk.color.description:
Utility class for converting color types and generating color schemes.
For color conversion methods, where the expected parameter is an array e.g `[0,0,0]`, the method can also be passed a comma separated value string, e.g. `'0,0,0'`, from which an array will automatically be extrapolated.

classitems.description: Gets or sets control item
classitems.name: val

classitems.description: Gets or sets control value
classitems.name: val

classitems.description: Gets or sets control disabled state
classitems.name: disabled

classitems.description: Fired on selected color changing (click, drag)
classitems.name: change

params.name: oldColor
params.description: HEX color string of previous color

params.name: newColor
params.description: HEX color string of new color

classitems.description: Gets or sets control value (HEX color string, e.g. `#000000`)
classitems.name: val

classitems.description: For the passed event object prevent bubbling up the DOM tree
classitems.name: preventBubble

classitems.description: For the passed element, toggle presence of CSS class
classitems.name: toggleClass

params.name: toggle
params.description: Optional. `true` to add class if not present, `false` to remove. If ommitted, method will detect and apply/remove as necessary.

classitems.description: For the passed element, detect presence of CSS class
classitems.name: hasClass

classitems.description: For the passed element, center horizontally and vertically within the parentNode
classitems.name: center

classitems.description: For the passed element, get the passed style property value
classitems.name: getStyle

classitems.description: For the passed element, add CSS class
classitems.name: addClass

classitems.description: For the passed element, remove CSS class
classitems.name: removeClass

classitems.description: Bind an element handler to a DOM node
classitems.name: bindEvent

params.name: function
params.description: Event handler to bind, function is passed originating event when called

classitems.description: Unbind an element handler from a DOM node
classitems.name: unbindEvent

classitems.description: Calculate positioning properties of passed DOM element, optionally augment passed event using `procEvent` for event based positioning
classitems.name: layout

return.description: Returns object consisting of `top`, `right`, `bottom`, `left`, `height` and `width` values as well as sub `offset` and `parent` objects

classitems.description: Apply a series of event listeners to a DOM element
classitems.name: bindListeners

params.name: listeners
params.description: Consisting of event objects to pass to `bindEvent` method

classitems.description: Generate a random number between the passed `min` and `max` values
classitems.name: getRand

return.description: Returns pseudo-random number between min and max

classitems.description: Extract unit type from passed string
classitems.name: getUnits

classitems.description: Finds matching DOM elements within passed DOM element
classitems.name: findEl

props.name: type
props.description: Element type to filter

props.name: class
props.description: Class type to filter

props.name: attribute
props.description: Attribute to filter

props.name: name
props.description: Attribute name to filter

props.name: value
props.description: Attribute value to filter

classitems.description: Wrap the passed DOM element in a new DOM node created from the `wrapper` string
classitems.name: wrapEl

params.name: wrapper
params.description: HTML string representing the new DOM wrapper

return.description: Returns newly created DOM wrapper element

classitems.description: Create a new DOM element from the passed `HTML` string (SVG agnostic)
classitems.name: createEl

params.name: HTML
params.description: HTML string representing the new DOM element

classitems.description: Get the index of the passed DOM node within the immediate parent
classitems.name: getIndex

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to return index for

classitems.description: Replace the passed DOM element with a new element created from the passed string, inclusive of all original attributes
classitems.name: replaceEl

params.name: HTML
params.description: HTML string representing the new DOM element

classitems.description: Forces the passed variable into an array, xploding comma seperated strings, keeping existing arrys, collapsing objects and or converting strings as necessary
classitems.name: toArr

classitems.description: Collides two arrays, either replacing one with the other, removing one from another, adding one to another or toggling the values of one in another
classitems.name: collide

params.name: type
params.description: Type of collision, `0` default, replace `array1` with `array2`, `1` add `array2` to `array1`, `2` remove `array2` from `array1`, `3` toggle `array2` values in `array1` (intelligent add/replace)

classitems.description: Returns normalized percentage value
classitems.name: perc

return.description: Returns noramlized percentage value between 1 and 0

classitems.description: Gets of sets attribute values, either explicitly or implicitly declared
classitems.name: attribute

params.name: attribute
params.description: Attribute name to get/set for single attribute, or `Array` of attribute:value Objects to set multiple attributes

params.name: value
params.description: Optional to get, or value of type specific to attribute if single attribute being set

classitems.description: Augments event object with additional X and Y helper coordinates
classitems.name: procEvent

return.description: Returns object with the additional attributes `posX`, `posY` are normalized absolutes, `offsetX`, offsetY` are normalized parent offsets, `viewportX`, `viewportY` are normalized viewport offsets

classitems.description: Gets browser agnostic offset coordinates for applicable mouse events
classitems.name: getEventOffset

return.description: Returns object comprising of normalized `x` and `y` offsets

classitems.description: Fired on drag event starting
classitems.name: dragstart

classitems.description: Fired on during drag event
classitems.name: dragging

classitems.description: Fired on drag event ending
classitems.name: dragend

classitems.description: Closes modal and removes from DOM

props.description: Notification content (`HTML` allowed)

props.name: delay
props.description: Time in `ms` for notificaiton to display for

classitems.description: Remove a notification

params.description: Starting color HEX value defaults to `#ff0000` red so 0% is red

params.name: hex2
